text: Catherine Simone Avnet Lazarus (April 26, 1976 â€“ December 13, 2020) was an American writer, comedian, and talk show host. Lazarus was best known as creator and host of the Employee of the Month, a monthly comedy show and podcast filmed live at Joe's Pub in New York City. Lazarus died from breast cancer at her apartment in New York City on December 13, 2020, at age 44. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:American radio personalities Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. title: Catie Lazarus
